name: Apocalypse (itch) (Joshcarmichael)
description:
Apocalypse (Demo) Notes 

This game is currently in the prototype stage. This means the game is a work in progress you may experience glitches or bugs while playing the game and the content in the game may not be final and can be changed. About  Apocalypse is a low poly fast-paced first-person shooter. Where you try to survive while fighting off hordes of zombies. Tasks  1) Stay alive 2) Kill everything 3) Earn points 4) Upgrade 5) Repeat How long can you survive?
